One last #WWDC prediction: iRadio or whatever it’ll be called. My money’s on “iTunes Radio.”
#WWDC MacPro prediction: It will get the biggest applause of the keynote.
#WWDC MacBook prediction: Upgraded processors, thinner Retina MBPs, and I’m going to want the new 13-inch version.
#WWDC OS X prediction: Will incorporate more iOS features and probably make pros angry (at first). Here’s hoping for OS X “Grumpy Cat.”
#WWDC iOS7 prediction: It will not be as different as people want, but will contain a lot of “refinements.”
#WWDC predictions: iOS 7, OS X, updated MacBooks, and a new Mac Pro.
